MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD4 postcode area of Earlston. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:30pm due to damage to our underground electricity network on Huntshaw Road and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:06pm on 13th April 2021.
